## Macroexpand-Noj - growing the Noj ecosystem

The Macroexpand-Noj conference is focused on the growth of the [Noj](https://scicloj.github.io/noj) toolkit for data science.

### Preferred topics
(tentative)

(Please see the [Speakers](./speakers.html) page for guidelines.)

The following will be prioiritized in talk proposals:

* Documentation of relevant libraries, theory, and methods
* Real-world data analysis examples (including follow-ups from [SciNoj Light](https://scicloj.github.io/scinoj-light-1/))
* New tools, libraries, and features
